column1: Funeral services for Chester Clarence Bolyer
column4: LA will be held at 2 P.M. Sunday
column6: 2015 at Rockett-Nettles Funeral Home Chapel with Bro. Loyce Plunkett officiating and Bro. David Bolyer assisting. Interment will follow in Ramah Cemetery. Visitation will be held from 6 P.M. until 9 P.M. Saturday
